body.name: mopio Ted Bed Frame with Headboard, Mid Century Modern Acacia Solid Wood Platform Bed Frame, Wooden Bed Slats, No Box Spring Needed, Double Metal Bar Support, Walnut (Queen Bed)
features: Dimensions: 63.4 (W) x 86 (D) x 39.4 (H) Inches ; 30-day return with 1-year warranty
Load: Supports 2 person, up to 660lbs in total

Design: Mid-century modern style with slated headboard and tapered legs. 100% solid acacia wood, coated and wire-brushed for scratch resistance and long-lasting use. Ergonomic, slanted headboard for optimal relaxation

Sturdy: 2 x heavy-duty twin powder-coated metal support bars, plywood bed slats with fastening tape, sturdy legs – well-built, easy installation, excellent support & sturdy for long-lasting use & hold well​. Supports up to 660lbs
Easy Assembly: 2 person, in less than 1 hour

Color Variation & Measurement Disclaimer: Please expect color variance between actual product and photos due to different lighting conditions and online viewing device settings. Please be aware that measurements stated may vary up to 0.5 inches due to mass production, please allocate for 0.5 inches difference when measuring before purchase. 30-day return with 1-year warranty

How many packages should I be expected to receive? One. You will be receiving one package from us. If my product is damaged upon arrival, what should I do? Do contact our friendly CX team with photos of the damaged parts. Rest assured our team will resolve the issue. The color looks different from images shown, what should I do? Our products are shot usually under studio lightings which are brighter. However, our products color variation will not differ from the actual product. How long should I expect a response from you? Our team is dedicated to respond to your queries within 24-48 hours. We seek your kind understanding for longer waiting times during peak season. What is the return policy? Returns accepted within Amazon's 30-day window. Reach out with images/videos for speedy processing. Be cautious of potential fees for returns lacking seller or Amazon labels. Further clarifications can be requested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking bed with reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: The Ted bed arrived within the specified delivery day and was in pristine condition thanks to the excellent packaging. The parts were meticulously wrapped and protected, ensuring that everything arrived undamaged. Assembling the bed was surprisingly easy. The parts were not only well-protected but also clearly labeled, making it very easy to identify each piece. The assembly instructions provided were clear and straightforward. The process was smooth and frustration-free. The instruction estimated the assembly time to take 1 hour for 2 persons, but I managed to put it together in less than 40 minutes by myself without any difficulty.Upon completion, I found that the assembled product matched the images displayed on the website. The Ted bed is very well built and sturdy. The quality of the wood used is good, and I think the bed should be very durable. In general, I am quite impressed with my purchase from Mopio. The entire process, its delivery and assembly, was seamless. And the bed is definitely worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdiness, modern and good value!
reviews.reviewText: This is the most easier project so far for us. My husband and I were able to build the bed in just half an hour, thanks to the clear instructions. I only wish that they had included extra bolts and screws, just in case, but the instructions were so easy that we didn't even need them. The bed feels solid, sturdy. It has a modern design that looks expensive, but is actually very affordable.One of the reasons we went for this was the double metal support bars where others we saw came with only 1. It's well-constructed so it looks like it'll hold up well, as me and my husband both heavy build. The color also looks same as they pictures. This is the only bed that my husband has ever been happy with, and we both love it very much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, no-nonsense bed at a decent price
reviews.reviewText: We needed a queen bed frame for our guest bedroom, and chose this one because of the included headboard and solid wood construction. It took me about 90 minutes to assemble by myself, but I wasn't rushing anything. The instructions were clear, and the hardware was individually packaged and clearly labeled, which made things go faster. There were a couple of places where the wood had chipped a little on the bed rails, but they were in places that were not that conspicuous, so I'm okay with that -- but I'm not sure where the damage might have happened since the boxes were in good shape and seemed packed well. It could have been marred from the factory or during shipping, but that's always a chance you take when ordering online. The finished frame is solid and silent. Having the two metal support rails is a very nice touch. We paired this bed with a couple of nightstands from the same manufacturer and series, and are happy with them overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and attractive
reviews.reviewText: Likes: Wood is beautiful, assembly instructions were easy to follow, customer service was super helpful and quick to reach out…after having for 2 months happy to report it’s quiet and all joints are tight.Dislikes: assembly is tight and will need a second person to help(keeping it square).Overall: very happy, purchased with matching side tables, just wish there was a dresser that matched as well! Dog approved!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful headboard. I still need to hang it on the wall, which I LOVE this as an option. Easy to assembly. Very sturdy. It’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy Real Wood
reviews.reviewText: Great bed w nice finish. Very sturdy, and feels solid.That said, there is some assembly required, but instructions are solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking bed!
reviews.reviewText: Clearly labeled with each piece of hardware in its own sealed bag. It required two people but was relatively easy to build. I like how the sides come a little above the mattress so it cannot slip. The rich brown color looks great. Time will tell how it holds up, but great so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible quality, terrible seller
reviews.reviewText: All metal fixtures for product were broken, they are made of metal that seems like soda can aluminum mixed with sand. The wood also looked as cheap as could be.
